scripts.db:generate: bun run --cwd packages/backend bunx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:push: bun run --cwd packages/backend bunx drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:studio: bun run --cwd packages/backend bunx drizzle-kit studio
scripts.check: oxfmt --check packages/backend/src packages/frontend/src && oxlint packages/backend/src packages/frontend/src
scripts.typecheck: bunx --cwd packages/backend tsc --noEmit && bunx --cwd packages/frontend vue-tsc --noEmit
